page.title: 10RELIGION IN DUDLEY (1)
page.content: At 4 primary schools (Sledmere,Kates Hill,Jessons C of E and Highgate) we questioned representatives about religion in their family. We questioned representatives of{580 {families.}There were 53 Sikhs,22 Hindus,243 Church of England,32 Methodist,5 Baptist ,20 Pentecostal, 7 Jehovah's Witness, 1 Roman Catholic,2 Seventh Day Adventist,3 New Testament church of God,2 Salvation Army,1 Free church,1 Quaker and 8 don't know. 105 families attend church{every week, 158{occasionally}and 279{never go.} 91 children regularly attend Sunday School. Many Roman Catholic children attend their own schools of which there are 4 primary schools in the whole borough and 1 secondary school (which admits many children from Sandwell).
